entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf Friday into Saturday... Elevated surf will develop Friday and continue into Saturday. entry.summary: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions expected.
